subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Organizers for the 2014 Winter Games in Sochi, Russia, are calling a new domestic sponsorship deal the largest of its kind in Olympic history. The Rostelecom and MegaFon telecommunications companies signed a contract worth $260 million. The companies plan to invest about $200 million to develop the region’s infrastructure.
